# FitnessOverlays
> Web app that creates Instagram-ready overlays from Strava workout data.

## Getting Started
- [Installation](NOTES.md): Setup with Python/Flask, Docker, and Tailwind CSS
- [Usage](README.md): Connect Strava, select activity, customize overlay, export PNG

## Examples
- [Demo Data](static/demo/activity_demo.json): Sample Strava activity data

## Reference
- [Developer Guide](NOTES.md): Commands for local dev, Docker, Tailwind builds, Strava webhooks
- [Project Overview](README.md): Supported metrics (distance, time, pace, heart rate, calories, elevation)

## Support
- [FAQ](https://fitnessoverlays.com/faq): Common questions about Strava integration and privacy

## Optional
- [License](LICENSE): AGPL-3.0 license
